title: Ticket #7016: Fix job run counts in grid universe and job router
description:
The grid universe and the job router don't properly update all of the job run count attributes in the job ad. In the worst case (HTCondor-CE in front of a non-HTCondor cluster), no count of job starts is incremented in the original job ad.

There are other job runtime attributes that Condor-C and the Job Router should probably propagate back as well.
